arkham.title: The Story Continues...
arkham.type: I cannot remember, I must not remember what I saw on that dark and foreboding night...
arkham.text: Shuffle the Mythos deck, being sure to include this card in it. After the deck is shuffled, draw a new Mythos card for the turn.

arkham.title: Good Work Undone
arkham.text: When this card enters play, place 6 Clue tokens on it. Any player may spend Clue tokens during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Easttown streets to discard Clue tokens from this card on a 1-for-1 basis.
arkham.effect: Roll two dice at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). For every 1 or 2 rolled, place 1 Clue token on this card.
arkham.pass: If there are no Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. Each player draws 1 Unique Item.
arkham.fail: If there are 10 Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. All elder sign tokens are removed from the board.
